name: Apple
description: A crisp and sweet red apple, handpicked from orchards in Kent, UK. Known for its juicy, refreshing taste, this apple is perfect for snacking or making pies.

name: Banana
description: Sweet, ripe bananas sourced from sustainable UK suppliers who import them from tropical regions like the Canary Islands. Rich in potassium and perfect for smoothies, baking, or eating on-the-go.

name: Mango
description: A juicy and aromatic mango imported to the UK from the Caribbean, known for its rich tropical flavor. Ideal for smoothies, salads, or desserts.

name: Grapes
description: Sweet and seedless grapes grown in vineyards in South Wales. These grapes are packed with antioxidants and are perfect for snacking or adding to salads.

name: Strawberry
description: Fresh, plump strawberries grown in the fields of Kent, UK. These berries are bursting with sweetness and perfect for making jams, cakes, or enjoying fresh.

name: Pineapple
description: Sweet, tangy pineapples imported to the UK from Costa Rica. Their juicy flesh makes them perfect for grilling, smoothies, or adding a tropical flair to fruit salads.

name: Orange
description: Tangy and refreshing oranges imported from Spain to the UK. These oranges are packed with vitamin C and are perfect for fresh juice or a healthy snack.

name: Peach
description: Sweet, juicy peaches grown in the orchards of Gloucestershire, UK. These peaches have a velvety skin and a rich, fragrant taste, perfect for desserts or fresh eating.

name: Kiwi
description: Tart and sweet kiwis grown in the UK’s greenhouses. With a fuzzy skin and vibrant green flesh, this fruit is a great addition to smoothies, fruit bowls, or as a standalone snack.

name: Watermelon
description: A refreshing, seedless watermelon grown in greenhouses in the UK. Perfect for hot summer days, this watermelon is juicy, sweet, and hydrating.

name: Carrot
description: Fresh, crunchy carrots harvested from organic farms in Norfolk, UK. These carrots are perfect for snacks, soups, or juicing, and are full of nutrients like beta-carotene.

name: Broccoli
description: Bright green broccoli florets, freshly picked from farms in Somerset, UK. Known for their rich vitamin C and fiber content, these are perfect for steaming or adding to stir-fries.

name: Spinach
description: Organic, tender spinach leaves harvested from farms in the UK. These greens are packed with iron and vitamins and are perfect for salads, smoothies, or sautéing.

name: Cucumber
description: Crisp and cool cucumbers grown in greenhouses across the UK. Ideal for fresh salads or making refreshing cucumber water.

name: Tomato
description: Juicy, vine-ripened tomatoes sourced from local UK farms. These tomatoes are perfect for fresh salads, salsas, or sauces, with a naturally sweet and tangy flavor.

name: Potato
description: Starchy and versatile potatoes, harvested from the fertile fields of Lincolnshire, UK. Perfect for baking, mashing, or frying, these potatoes are a kitchen staple.

name: Onion
description: Sweet yellow onions grown in the rich soils of Yorkshire, UK. These onions add rich flavor to any dish, from soups to salads.

name: Bell Pepper
description: Vibrant bell peppers, grown in the sunny fields of the UK. These peppers come in a variety of colors and are perfect for stir-fries, grilling, or stuffing.

name: Zucchini
description: Tender green zucchini, grown organically in the UK. Perfect for grilling, sautéing, or making zucchini noodles for a healthy, low-carb meal.

name: Cauliflower
description: Fresh cauliflower heads, harvested from organic farms in the UK. With a mild taste, this vegetable is great for roasting, making cauliflower rice, or as a low-carb substitute in dishes.
